com.stms.web

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stms.web.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Task class for Student Time Management System Used to create new and edit existing tasks in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Task()
      Blank constructor used to create and insert new task records in the database.
      Task(int taskID)
      Parameterised constructor used to create and fetch an existing task from the database.
